ProjectTitle: Local field potential recordings in deep brain stimulation patients
InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/05/2022 2. Please give an estimated volume of the datasets, you can use this to calculate storage volume and costs under 5 and 6 4. [REDACTED] may also collect metadata with your measurements, medical imaging often follows the DICOM standard for example (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.b7z8by) contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you need more information 6. Please note that the UZL CTC expects data related to a clinical trail to be preserved for 25 years (https://gbiomed.kuleuven.be/english/ctc) 7. [REDACTED] can mention privacy as factor restricting sharing under 7a. [REDACTED] you deposit (a selection of) your data in a repository under restricted access, for example in RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)? 03/05/2022 2.
